snippet.title: Alpha Storm for DOS
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

---


Game description:

Alpha Storm is a first person shooter game combined with spaceship simulator and strategy. The player in his space ship travels across multiple star systems and meet the enemies there. Battles can be played in two levels - on a 2D tactical map from top-down view on ships, or after the destruction of enemy shields and teleporting on his deck in classic 3D FPS action, where the goal is to eliminate the crew and get valuable materials for ship upgrades.
